name: backend
description: All backend activities will be carried out in this folder

scripts.test:coverage: nyc npm run test && nyc report --reporter=lcov
scripts.test:coveralls: nyc npm run test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov --coverage | coveralls
scripts.coverage: npm run test:coveralls && npm run test:coverage
scripts.coveralls: npm run test -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: AbbieN
